content.description: Awaiting an FA. This starts around the left from Orb Weaver near where the block touches Bat Boulder. Climb up the straight vertical crack and top out to the right per Orb Weaver. You have the option to bail off left onto the top of Bat Boulder but a fall could be nasty
content.location: Crack to the left around from Orb Weaver near the part of the boulder that touches Bat Boulder.

content.description: Start at the bottom of the crack matched with a heel on the jug. Move up and left through the crack using terrible feet. Catch the huge undercling as the crack turns upwards and blast to a high right sidepull. Walk up the crack and over the topout. Classic!
content.location: The most obvious line on Royal Boulder.

content.description: On the uphill-most elevated boulder with a rear, diagonal slopey slash, start in the undercling beneath the belly of the boulder. Move into the crimps out of the overhang, and trend right through the slopey slash to the deeper jug section. Roll over the rounded top and continue upward.
One of two climbable boulders that make up a small cluster downhill from both Bastion and Bouldergasm, identified by the giant diagonal crack.
